title: Reverse Yesterday
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about people who are snowed in at a pub with an Oasis cover band, the Waffle House backgammon network, the seed for creativity, and more!

Have something interesting you want to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
